snippet: Bolshoi Ballet officials are considering a lawsuit after one of its dancers made public criticisms of the theater’s management.
abstract: Bolshoi Ballet administration threatens to file lawsuit against dancer Nikolai Tsiskaridze after he publicly criticizes theater's management over its response to acid attack on ballet’s artistic director, Sergei Filin.
lead_paragraph: Bolshoi Ballet officials are considering a lawsuit after one of its dancers made public criticisms of the theater’s management.

headline.seo: Bolshoi Ballet Considers Suing One of Its Dancers
headline.main: Bolshoi Ballet Considers Suing One of Its Own
headline.print_headline: Bolshoi Ballet Considers Suing One of Its Own
